thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com | 4 of 121
thread.title: David Mc
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by David Mc

author: David Mc
title: David Mc
text: I make a mess of my order and ended up with the wrong iso fix base which was entirely my mistake. Kiddies Kingdom could not have been more helpful in sorting it out and getting the correct base to me, bending their rules in the process. Its refreshing to deal with a company who are willing to help and assess each case on its merits rather than blindly following the rules. Well done & thank you.
